name: COBIT 2019
description: Control Objectives for Information and Related Technologies - Governance and Management Objectives

requirements.title: Ensured Governance Framework Setting and Maintenance
requirements.description: Analyze and articulate the requirements for the governance of enterprise IT. Put in place and maintain effective enabling structures, principles, processes, and practices.
requirements.description_long: Provide a consistent approach integrated and aligned with the enterprise governance approach. IT-related decisions are made in line with the enterprise's strategies and objectives and desired value is realized effectively and efficiently.

requirements.title: Ensured Benefits Delivery
requirements.description: Optimize the value contribution to the business from the business processes, IT services, and IT assets resulting from investments made by IT at acceptable costs.
requirements.description_long: Secure optimal value from IT-enabled initiatives, services, and assets; cost-efficient delivery of solutions and services; and a reliable and accurate picture of costs and likely benefits.

requirements.title: Ensured Risk Optimization
requirements.description: Ensure that the enterprise's risk appetite and tolerance are understood, articulated, and communicated, and that risk to enterprise value related to the use of IT is identified and managed.
requirements.description_long: Ensure that IT-related enterprise risk does not exceed the enterprise's risk appetite and risk tolerance, the impact of IT risk to enterprise value is identified and managed, and the potential for compliance failures is minimized.

requirements.title: Ensured Resource Optimization
requirements.description: Ensure that adequate and sufficient IT-related capabilities are available to support enterprise objectives effectively at optimal cost.
requirements.description_long: Ensure that the resource needs of the enterprise are met in the optimal manner, IT costs are optimized, and there is an increased likelihood of benefit realization and readiness for future change.

requirements.title: Ensured Stakeholder Engagement
requirements.description: Ensure that stakeholders are supportive of the IT strategy and road map, communication is effective and timely, and the basis for reporting is established to increase performance.
requirements.description_long: Ensure stakeholders are identified and engaged, and reporting is appropriate and timely. Establish the basis for increasing performance through stakeholder engagement.

requirements.title: Managed IT Management Framework
requirements.description: Clarify and maintain the governance of enterprise IT. Implement and maintain mechanisms and authorities to manage information and the use of IT in the enterprise.
requirements.description_long: Provide a consistent management approach to enable the enterprise governance requirements to be met, covering management processes, organizational structures, roles and responsibilities, reliable and repeatable activities, and skills and competencies.

requirements.title: Managed Strategy
requirements.description: Provide a holistic view of the current business and IT environment, the future direction, and the initiatives required to migrate to the desired future environment.
requirements.description_long: Achieve the desired business outcomes through IT-enabled business transformation. Leverage efficient and innovative IT capabilities. Improve responsiveness to changing business needs.

requirements.title: Managed Enterprise Architecture
requirements.description: Establish a common architecture consisting of business process, information, data, application, and technology architecture layers for effectively and efficiently realizing enterprise and IT strategies.
requirements.description_long: Represent the different building blocks that make up the enterprise and their interrelationships, as well as the principles guiding their design and evolution over time, enabling a standard, responsive, and efficient delivery of operational and strategic objectives.

requirements.title: Managed Innovation
requirements.description: Maintain an awareness of information technology and related service trends, identify innovation opportunities, and plan how to benefit from innovation in relation to business needs.
requirements.description_long: Achieve competitive advantage, business innovation, and improved operational effectiveness and efficiency by exploiting information technology developments.

requirements.title: Managed Portfolio
requirements.description: Execute the strategic direction set for investments in line with the enterprise architecture vision and the desired characteristics of the investment and related services portfolios.
requirements.description_long: Optimize the performance of the overall portfolio of programs in response to individual program and service performance and changing enterprise priorities and demands.

requirements.title: Managed Budget and Costs
requirements.description: Manage the IT-related financial activities in both the business and IT functions, covering budget, cost and benefit management, and prioritization of spending.
requirements.description_long: Foster partnership between IT and enterprise stakeholders to enable the effective and efficient use of IT-related resources and provide transparency and accountability of the cost and business value of solutions and services.

requirements.title: Managed Human Resources
requirements.description: Provide a structured approach to ensure optimal structuring, placement, decision rights, and skills of human resources.
requirements.description_long: Optimize human resources capabilities to meet enterprise objectives. Ensure that the enterprise has sufficient human resources with the appropriate skills and competencies.

requirements.title: Managed Relationships
requirements.description: Manage the relationship between the business and IT in a formalized and transparent way that ensures a focus on achieving a common and shared goal of successful enterprise outcomes.
requirements.description_long: Create improved outcomes, increased confidence in IT, and effective use of resources. Enable the business to understand and leverage IT capabilities.

requirements.title: Managed Service Agreements
requirements.description: Align IT-enabled services and service levels with enterprise needs and expectations, including identification, specification, design, publishing, agreement, and monitoring of IT services.
requirements.description_long: Ensure that IT services and service levels meet current and future enterprise needs. Enable effective use of IT resources and provide a clear specification of service requirements.

requirements.title: Managed Vendors
requirements.description: Manage IT-related services provided by all types of vendors to meet enterprise requirements, including the selection of vendors, management of relationships, management of contracts.
requirements.description_long: Minimize the risk associated with nonperforming vendors and ensure competitive pricing. Enable the enterprise to select the most appropriate vendors and manage them effectively.

requirements.title: Managed Quality
requirements.description: Define and communicate quality requirements in all processes, procedures, and the related enterprise outcomes. Monitor and measure quality against targets and take action to address deviations.
requirements.description_long: Ensure consistent delivery of solutions and services to meet the quality requirements of the enterprise and satisfy stakeholder needs.

requirements.title: Managed Risk
requirements.description: Continually identify, assess, and reduce IT-related risk within levels of tolerance set by enterprise executive management.
requirements.description_long: Integrate the management of IT-related enterprise risk with overall enterprise risk management and balance the costs and benefits of managing IT-related enterprise risk.

requirements.title: Managed Security
requirements.description: Define, operate, and monitor a system for information security management.
requirements.description_long: Keep the impact and occurrence of information security incidents within the enterprise's risk appetite levels. Protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of information.

requirements.title: Managed Data
requirements.description: Achieve and maintain effective management of enterprise data assets throughout the data life cycle.
requirements.description_long: Ensure that enterprise data is managed effectively throughout its life cycle, from creation through disposal. Enable effective use of data to support business objectives.

requirements.title: Managed Programs
requirements.description: Manage all programs from the investment portfolio in alignment with enterprise strategy and in a coordinated way based on the standard program management approach.
requirements.description_long: Realize business benefits and reduce the risk of unexpected delays, costs, and value erosion by improving communications to and involvement of business and end users.

requirements.title: Managed Requirements Definition
requirements.description: Identify solutions and analyze requirements before acquisition or creation to ensure that they are in line with enterprise strategic requirements.
requirements.description_long: Create optimal solutions that meet enterprise needs while minimizing risk. Enable the enterprise to select the most appropriate solutions.

requirements.title: Managed Solutions Identification and Build
requirements.description: Establish and maintain identified solutions in line with enterprise requirements covering design, development, procurement, and partnering with suppliers/vendors.
requirements.description_long: Ensure agile and scalable IT solutions that are capable of supporting enterprise objectives. Enable the enterprise to leverage new technologies and methods.

requirements.title: Managed Availability and Capacity
requirements.description: Balance current and future needs for availability, performance, and capacity with cost-effective service provision.
requirements.description_long: Maintain service availability, efficient management of resources, and optimization of system performance through prediction of future performance and capacity requirements.

requirements.title: Managed Organizational Change
requirements.description: Maximize the likelihood of successfully implementing sustainable enterprisewide organizational change quickly and with reduced risk.
requirements.description_long: Prepare and commit stakeholders for business changes and reduce the risk of failure. Enable the enterprise to realize the expected benefits of business changes.

requirements.title: Managed IT Changes
requirements.description: Manage all changes in a controlled manner, including standard changes and emergency maintenance relating to business processes, applications, and infrastructure.
requirements.description_long: Enable fast and reliable delivery of change to the business while mitigating the risks of negatively impacting the stability or integrity of the changed environment.

requirements.title: Managed IT Change Acceptance and Transitioning
requirements.description: Formally accept and make operational new solutions, including implementation planning, system and data conversion, acceptance testing, communication, release preparation.
requirements.description_long: Implement solutions safely and in line with the agreed expectations and outcomes. Enable the enterprise to realize the expected benefits of new solutions.

requirements.title: Managed Knowledge
requirements.description: Maintain the availability of relevant, current, validated, and reliable knowledge to support all process activities and to facilitate decision making.
requirements.description_long: Provide the knowledge required to support all staff in their work activities and for informed decision making and enhanced productivity.

requirements.title: Managed Assets
requirements.description: Manage IT assets through their life cycle to make sure that their use delivers value at optimal cost, they remain operational, they are accounted for and physically protected.
requirements.description_long: Account for all IT assets and optimize the value provided by these assets. Enable the enterprise to manage IT assets effectively throughout their life cycle.

requirements.title: Managed Configuration
requirements.description: Define and maintain descriptions and relationships between key resources and capabilities required to deliver IT-enabled services.
requirements.description_long: Provide sufficient information about service assets to enable the service to be effectively managed. Assess the impact of changes and deal with service incidents.

requirements.title: Managed Projects
requirements.description: Manage all projects initiated in the enterprise in alignment with enterprise strategy and in a coordinated way based on the standard project management approach.
requirements.description_long: Realize business benefits and reduce the risk of unexpected delays, costs, and value erosion by improving communications to and involvement of business and end users.

requirements.title: Managed Operations
requirements.description: Coordinate and execute the activities and operational procedures required to deliver internal and outsourced IT services.
requirements.description_long: Deliver IT operational service outcomes as planned. Enable the enterprise to maintain business process continuity and minimize the impact of IT service disruptions.

requirements.title: Managed Service Requests and Incidents
requirements.description: Provide timely and effective response to user requests and resolution of all types of incidents. Restore normal service; record and fulfill user requests.
requirements.description_long: Achieve increased productivity and minimize disruptions through quick resolution of user queries and incidents. Improve user satisfaction with IT services.

requirements.title: Managed Problems
requirements.description: Identify and classify problems and their root causes and provide timely resolution to prevent recurring incidents and provide recommendations for improvements.
requirements.description_long: Increase availability, improve service levels, reduce costs, and improve customer convenience and satisfaction by reducing the number of operational problems.

requirements.title: Managed Continuity
requirements.description: Establish and maintain a plan to enable the business and IT to respond to incidents and disruptions in order to continue operation of critical business processes.
requirements.description_long: Continue critical business operations and maintain availability of information at a level acceptable to the enterprise in the event of a significant disruption.

requirements.title: Managed Security Services
requirements.description: Protect enterprise information to maintain the level of information security risk acceptable to the enterprise in accordance with the security policy.
requirements.description_long: Minimize the business impact of operational information security vulnerabilities and incidents. Protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of information.

requirements.title: Managed Business Process Controls
requirements.description: Define and maintain appropriate business process controls to ensure that information related to and processed by in-house or outsourced business processes satisfies requirements.
requirements.description_long: Maintain information integrity and the security of information assets handled within business processes in the enterprise or outsourced.

requirements.title: Managed Performance and Conformance Monitoring
requirements.description: Collect, validate, and evaluate business, IT, and process goals and metrics. Monitor that processes are performing against agreed performance and conformance goals.
requirements.description_long: Provide transparency of performance and conformance and drive achievement of goals. Enable the enterprise to take corrective action when performance deviates from targets.

requirements.title: Managed System of Internal Control
requirements.description: Continuously monitor and evaluate the control environment, including self-assessments and independent assurance reviews.
requirements.description_long: Obtain transparency for key stakeholders on the adequacy of the system of internal controls and thus provide trust in operations, confidence in the achievement of enterprise objectives.

requirements.title: Managed Compliance with External Requirements
requirements.description: Evaluate that IT processes and IT-supported business processes are compliant with laws, regulations, and contractual requirements.
requirements.description_long: Ensure that the enterprise is compliant with all applicable external requirements. Minimize the risk of compliance failures and associated penalties.

requirements.title: Managed Assurance
requirements.description: Enable the organization to design and develop efficient and effective assurance initiatives, providing guidance on planning, scoping, executing, and following up on assurance reviews.
requirements.description_long: Provide assurance that IT processes and IT-supported business processes are operating as intended and in compliance with applicable requirements.
